compliant.section: Your resume, working experience or related information as well while you apply for a post.
compliant.legal provisions: Legitimate interests pursued by the controller or by a third party.

non_compliant.section: Please note that your account information will be modified in order to keep it correct and the latest, if your private information we've got via the other ways which our sales have is not consistent with information you already registered on this page.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Fair and transparent processing; Purpose limitation
non_compliant.amend: Data collected from other sources must be explicitly disclosed to the user, and consent must be obtained before merging it with existing account information. The purpose for data collection and processing must be specific, explicit, and legitimate, and data processing should be limited to what is necessary for those purposes.

non_compliant.section: Your name, mailing/shipping/billing address (including zip code), contact information, e-mail address, credit card number or other payment service information when you make a purchase of our devices/SERVICE or when you make certain customer service request.
non_compliant.amend: Only collect and process the minimum data necessary for the specific purpose (purchase or customer service). Data should not be stored longer than necessary for the purpose it was collected.
